nodes.text: Stivic was a colony world of the Garwians. Like other Garwian Unity worlds, it was a commerce center for a number of species.

Of all the Garwian worlds, Stivic was particularly close to Lioaoin space. That made
Stivic an easy target for Lioaoin pirates. As such, Stivic was the site of the Stivic incident, part of the Lioaoin pirate campaign.
